channel.title: OMG! One of my favorite bands just called me!
channel.description:
Here is the band site: http://myspace.com/catherine I know a band calling your house may not be a big deal to some people, (people that go to concerts or groupies?) but one of my favorite bands just called my house phone and talked to me. (the drummer)
Earlier, on MySpace, I asked for autographs in a message and left my address, phone, and e-mail, requesting they send to my address, and call or e-mail telling me that they did. The drummer took the time to call me.
Me: Hello? Him: Hey is this Jimmy? Me: Yes, who's this? Him: This is the drummer of Catherine. Me: *Thinking OMFG* Him: I just read your message on MySpace, and I just wanna let you know that we read them. Me: *Still OMFGing* Him: You there? Me: Yes, just surprised you called instead of e-mailing or something. Him: Ok, well, I called to tell you that we are on tour right now, but when we get settled, I'll get the band to sign and I'll send our autographs. Ok? Me: Ok, thank you so much! Him: No problem. Cya. Me: Bye. *hangs up in shock*
This might not have amazed some people, but I have never even been to a concert, so talking to a band member was an amazing experience. Now I know I am getting autographs also, so I am so happy.
And I don't care if you don't like the band, but imagine if it was a band you liked.

item.title: OMG! One of my favorite bands just called me!
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:20, topic:34497”]That’s cool I guess…

Unfortunatly the chances of the bands I like calling me is pretty slim, seeing as they are all pretty much from the 80’s. Although, if Tom Petty phoned me, I’d probably excited enough to make a thread about it too.[/quote]

Yes, same with me. Although, I got to talk to Duff McKagen, Slash, And Axl Rose from Guns N Roses for about an hour because we have back stage passes and barely anyone else did. So I did get to talk to him. Also, I dont think some people like david coverdale even care about there old bands. lelelle

Read full topic

item.title: OMG! One of my favorite bands just called me!
item.dc:creator: @jimmy0s Jimmy OS
item.description:
@jimmy0s wrote:

Here is the band site: http://myspace.com/catherine
I know a band calling your house may not be a big deal to some people, (people that go to concerts or groupies?) but one of my favorite bands just called my house phone and talked to me. (the drummer)

Earlier, on MySpace, I asked for autographs in a message and left my address, phone, and e-mail, requesting they send to my address, and call or e-mail telling me that they did. The drummer took
the time to call me.

Me: Hello?
Him: Hey is this Jimmy?
Me: Yes, who’s this?
Him: This is the drummer of Catherine.
Me: Thinking OMFG
Him: I just read your message on MySpace, and I just wanna let you know that we read them.
Me: Still OMFGing
Him: You there?
Me: Yes, just surprised you called instead of e-mailing or something.
Him: Ok, well, I called to tell you that we are on tour right now, but when we get settled, I’ll get the band to sign and I’ll send our autographs. Ok?
Me: Ok, thank you so much!
Him: No problem. Cya.
Me: Bye.
hangs up in shock

This might not have amazed some people, but I have never even been to a concert, so talking to a band member was an amazing experience. Now I know I am getting autographs also, so I am so happy.

And I don’t care if you don’t like the band, but imagine if it was a band you liked.
